2.title: How to organize your expenses with Profit&Lost
2.excerpt: A step-by-step guide to take control of your finances
2.author: Profit&Lost Team

content.intro: Do you find it hard to control your monthly expenses? 💸 Want to know where your money goes and how you can save more? 💰 At Profit&Lost, we've designed a simple and visual tool to help you organize your finances. In this tutorial, we explain step by step how to do it.

step1.title: Step 1: Create your account and customize your categories
items: Register at
Once inside, go to the Categories section and create the ones that best fit your expenses (e.g., work, home, supermarket, leisure, etc.). 🎨
Customize the colors of each category to identify them easily. 🌈

step2.title: Step 2: Add your income and expenses
items: Go to the Transactions section. 📊
Add your income (salary, freelance, etc.) and your expenses (purchases, bills, etc.). 🏦
Assign each transaction to the corresponding category. 🏷️

step3.title: Step 3: Visualize and analyze your finances
items: In the Monthly Visualization section, you'll see a graph showing your income vs. expenses. 📈
Identify which categories you spend more on and adjust your budget if necessary. ⚖️

step4.title: Step 4: Set goals and save
items: Soon, you'll be able to use the Goals section to set financial goals (e.g., save for a trip ✈️ or pay off debts 💳).
Review your progress monthly and celebrate your achievements. 🎉

additionalTips.title: Additional tips
items: Review your transactions weekly to maintain control. 📅
Use the Notes section to write down important details (e.g., "This month I spent more on leisure"). 📝

content.callToAction: 👉 Ready to take control of your finances? Try Profit&Lost today and discover how easy it can be. 🚀

3.title: How to organize your money with the 50/30/20 method
3.excerpt: 📊 Managing your money can be easy with the 50/30/20 method. Do you know it? I'll explain it to you.
3.author: Profit&Lost Team

content.intro: Managing your money effectively is a challenge for many people. However, there is a simple and easy-to-apply method that can help you balance your income and ensure you cover all your needs without neglecting savings: the 50/30/20 method.
content.explanation: This financial management system, popularized by the American senator Elizabeth Warren in her book All Your Worth: The Ultimate Lifetime Money Plan, divides your income into three large categories: needs, wants, and savings. In this article, we will explain how it works and how to apply it in your daily life with the help of Profit&Lost.

whatIs.title: 💼 What is the 50/30/20 method?
whatIs.description:
This system divides your net income (after taxes) into the following proportions:

50% for needs: Basic expenses necessary to live.

30% for wants: Optional purchases or entertainment.

20% for savings and investment: Build long-term financial security.

needs.title: 📅 50%: Needs
needs.description: This is the money destined for expenses that you cannot avoid. It includes:
needs.note: If these expenses exceed 50% of your income, you may consider reducing costs, looking for more economical alternatives, or increasing your income.

wants.title: 🎉 30%: Wants
wants.description: These expenses are those that improve your quality of life but are not essential. Here are some examples:
wants.note: Controlling these expenses is key to avoiding that they affect your finances. Profit&Lost allows you to label these purchases and visualize how much you are spending on wants.

savings.title: 💼 20%: Savings and investment
savings.description: This is the part that many people neglect, but it is the most important to achieve financial stability. It should be dedicated to:

items.1: ✅ Emergency fund (ideally 3-6 months of fixed expenses)
items.2: ✅ Personal goals savings (buying a house, studies, trips)
items.3: ✅ Investments (indexed funds, stocks, cryptocurrencies, real estate)

savings.note: Automatizing this savings with tools like Profit&Lost helps to achieve goals without effort.

howTo.title: 📈 How to apply the 50/30/20 method with Profit&Lost

items.1: Register your income: Enter your net salary to calculate how to divide it
items.2: Categorize your expenses: Use labels to identify needs, wants and savings
items.3: Visualize your progress: Graphs and reports help you know if you are following the method
items.4: Adjust your budget: If you are spending too much on wants, you can balance it quickly

items.1: ✅ Simplicity: You don't need advanced financial knowledge
items.2: ✅ Flexibility: It adapts to any income level
items.3: ✅ Financial discipline: It helps you avoid unnecessary expenses
items.4: ✅ Security: You build a financial cushion for the future

4.title: Install Profit&Lost on your mobile and access your financial management easily!
4.excerpt: Discover how to install Profit&Lost as a PWA on your device for faster and more convenient access.
4.author: Profit&Lost Team

content.intro: Now you can access Profit&Lost quickly and easily by installing our PWA (Progressive Web App) on your mobile or desktop device. This allows you to open the platform as if it were a native application, without the need to download it from the app store.

benefits.title: 👉 Benefits of installing Profit&Lost as a PWA:
items: ✅ Quick access from the home screen
✅ Better performance and faster loading
✅ No additional space on your device
✅ Available on Android, iOS and desktop

installation.title: How to install Profit&Lost on your device?

android.title: 📱 For Android users:
steps: Open Google Chrome and visit profit-lost.com
Tap the menu (the three dots in the top right corner)
Click Install and you will have Profit&Lost as an app on your mobile

ios.title: 🍏 For iOS users (iPhone and iPad):
steps: Tap the share icon (a square with an arrow pointing up)
Write the name of the app if you want and press "Add"
Now you will see the Profit&Lost icon on your home screen

desktop.title: 🖥️ Para usuarios de escritorio (Windows y Mac):
steps: Open the browser and visit profit-lost.com
In the address bar, search for the PWA installation icon (a square with a downward arrow or a "+" icon)
Profit&Lost will open in a separate window as an app

content.conclusion:
👉 Start managing your finances in a practical way!

With this installation, you will be able to access Profit&Lost quickly and enjoy a fluid experience.

If you have any questions or need help, write to us. We are here to help you improve your financial management!

help.title: Help
help.howToStart: How to start using Profit & Lost?
help.howToStartDescription: Starting with Profit & Lost is very easy:
help.howToStartStep1: 1. Personalize your initial preferences to adapt them to your needs.
help.howToStartStep2: 2. Go to the 'Annual Report' section and create your categories to organize your financial movements.
help.howToStartStep3: 3. In 'Transactions', start recording your income and expenses to keep a detailed control.
help.manageAccountsDescription: In the 'Accounts' section, you have full control over your accounts. You can:
help.manageAccountsStep1: 1. Create new accounts for different purposes (e.g. bank accounts, savings, etc.).
help.manageAccountsStep2: 2. Edit existing accounts to adjust details like name or configuration.
help.manageAccountsStep3: 3. Customize each account with unique colors to easily identify it.
help.manageAccountsStep4: 4. Delete accounts that you no longer need.
help.manageAccountsStep5: 5. Hide accounts that you don't want to see in your reports.
help.categoriesWorkDescription: Categories are the key to keeping your finances organized. With them you can:
help.categoriesWorkStep1: 1. Create custom categories according to your needs.
help.categoriesWorkStep2: 2. Assign colors to them to easily identify them in your graphs and reports.
help.categoriesWorkStep3: 3. Use them to classify and analyze your financial movements effectively.
help.protectData: How do I protect my data in Profit & Lost?
help.protectDataDescription: Profit & Lost prioritizes the security of your data:
help.protectDataStep1: 1. All information is encrypted to ensure its protection.
help.protectDataStep2: 2. You can change your password at any time from the 'Security & Privacy' section.
help.protectDataStep3: 3. Activate two-factor authentication for greater security.
help.viewReports: How do I view my financial reports?
help.viewReportsDescription: In the 'Reports' section, you can generate detailed reports that include:
help.viewReportsStep1: 1. Monthly or annual summaries of your movements.
help.viewReportsStep2: 2. Graphical analysis of your expenses and income by category.
help.viewReportsStep3: 3. Download reports in formats like PDF or Excel for review at any time.
help.mobileUsage: Can I use Profit & Lost on my mobile?
help.mobileUsageDescription: Yes! Profit & Lost is optimized for mobile devices. You just need to access our platform from your mobile browser entering profit-lost.com to enjoy all the features.
help.mobileUsageStep1: You can put the direct access to our web on your home screen so it appears as an app on your device.
help.contactSupportDescription: Our support team is here to help you. You can contact us through:
help.contactSupportStep2: Consult our online documentation to find detailed guides and quick solutions.
